ngiemboon: Á ge láʼ gwɔ́ lyɛʼó ŋwɛ́, aláʼ gie á kẅɛ̌ɛ ndá nkwɔɔn, à gɔɔn ngie:
en: On that day you will say:

ngiemboon: Ɔɔ Ssé gie e ka kẅé twó yɔ́ɔn,
Pi ge láʼa lyɛʼó ŋwɛ́, é gɔɔn ngie:
en: and on that day you will say,
Sing to the Lord, for he has done glorious things.
Cry out and sing, citizen of Zion,
